execution_quality: The agent read a report file and executed bash commands to examine underlying data and calculations. Two errors were encountered but the agent completed the analysis of metric derivation.
work_category: Investigation into the quantitative basis of reported metrics in an analysis report.
summary: The agent investigated the quantitative basis of reported metrics through file examination and command execution, recovering from errors to complete the analysis. The user's positive follow-up indicates satisfaction with the work quality despite encountering minor issues.
follow_up_pattern: User approved the investigation and requested refinement (dropping communication quality metric) followed by generation of shareable HTML/PDF formats.
